Control Name: Assesses Vendor and Business Partner Risks—The entity assesses, on a periodic basis, the risks that vendors and business partners (and those entities’ vendors and business partners) represent to the achievement of the entity's objectives.

control_attributes.Control: Assesses Vendor and Business Partner Risks—The entity assesses, on a periodic basis, the risks that vendors and business partners (and those entities’ vendors and business partners) represent to the achievement of the entity's objectives.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC9.2 The entity assesses and manages risks associated with vendors and business partners.
